name: Think Tank Designs
description:
Think Tank Designs is a web design agency offering print and online creative services to medium size companies. We act as a virtual design department for businesses who may not want to hire design staff. We also help in-house design departments with overflow work, or sometimes just to offer another perspective.We provide these design services:
Web Design (ie; ecommerce, site maintenance, content management systems, redesigns)
Graphic Design (ie; packaging, catalogs, sell sheets)
Consulting
Email Marketing
Website Audits
